title: Phone Communication Serves as a Lifeline for Prisoners and Their Families
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Crime - Today 
For 2.7 million children, prison phone calls serve as a vital "lifeline" for remaining in contact with their incarcerated parent. In fact, 6...
